content.p: Medical and health insurance is mandatory and must be procured through UNM or EMGS. This applies to all foreign students who are 18 years and above and intend to apply for a student pass in Malaysia. All new International Student will be covered by Group Hospital & Surgical Policy under TOKIO MARINE INSURANCE MALAYSIA. Please find attached Group Hospital & Surgical Insurance Policy for further information: TM Policy & Table of Benefits. ***All international students who have been granted a full duration visa ( 2, 3 or more years ) are still required to pay for their medical insurance on a yearly basis despite being granted a full visa. This is mandatory for all international students who are holding a student pass. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8778 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8005
